attributes.action: Change way child benefit is paid to parents for twins
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
They say u need less for second child as you have clothes left over from your first child, so you don't need as much money for your second child. 
Well this isn't the case for parents of twins as they have to be bought same clothes at the same time, so i don't see we should get less money for the second twin as they both need the same things at the same time. Especially when are your first children.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
